title: Milestones & Zotchulidwa - Orbital Temple
heading: Milestones & Zotchulidwa
description: Zojambula zazaka zambiri ndi gawo la 13th Mercosul Bienal ku Porto Alegre, Brazil, motsogozedwa ndi Marcelo Dantas. Yalembedwa kwa nthawi yayitali pa Lumen Prize 2022 - Futures Award. Yapambananso Gulu la ArtSat la mpikisano wa CubeDesign 2021, wolimbikitsidwa ndi Brazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE).
